news.title: Welcome to CHIVE
news.news:
We are excited to announce the official launch of the Computer Human Interaction and Visualization Experience (CHIVE) Lab, established in August 2023 at the Division of Computer Science and Engineering, Louisiana State University.

Under the guidance of Dr. Mahmood Jasim, our lab explores cutting-edge research at the intersection of Human-Computer Interaction, Information and Data Visualization, Digital Civics, Applied Machine Learning, Natural Language Processing, and Social Computing.

At CHIVE, we aim to design impactful, user-centered technologies that bridge the gap between data, people, and society.

Stay tuned for updates, projects, and opportunities to collaborate!
